column4: anyone know any bittorrent different than bittorrent download client and transmission bittorrent client?
because those programs don't verify local data properly
I mean I was donwloading in windows bittorrent some files about 12GB and had like 6GB done
wanted to continue the download from 6GB upwards
but fails in verifying local data :(
I have transmission and bittorrent download client
and none of them verified the data even when you set it to install in the same place?
but then suddenly the torrent became Paused
I clicked on veryfy local data again
and after a while veryfing...again paused automatically
maybe because it's a big file and in an external USB harddrive
have you tried resuming it? I don't think that's got to do with your already-downloaded data
but in windows XP the bittorrent works fine :(
how can I set an ad hoc wireless network that uses wep encryption?
I don't know, it worked fine here too :/
